attributes.action: confer upon the town and the people of Wootten bassett in Wiltshire some kind of recognition or Honour for their dedication and spirit in honouring the Fallen from Iraq and Afghanistan over recent years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the people and town of wootten bassett should be recognised in some way, by either some honour for the town or something. surely there must be a way to mark what they are doing for the fallen. to see them each time one of our unfortunate brave soldiers returns home is so moving they are quite wonderful people

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
